vote.text: Amendment SA 3890 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3890 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3748. To establish the SkyFoundry Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3890 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3890 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
